<!----> <meta itemprop="headline" content="å‰ç«¯æ‘¸ğŸŸå°å­ï¼Œæ•™ä½ å‡å°‘æ— æ„ä¹‰çš„ç¼–ç "> <meta itemprop="keywords" content="å‰ç«¯,JavaScript"> <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21T01:42:59.000Z"> <meta itemprop="image" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-128.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <div itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><meta itemprop="name" content="å‰ç«¯é‡‘ç†Š"> <meta itemprop="url" content="https://juejin.cn/user/97193028493655"></div> <div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="æ˜é‡‘"> <div itemprop="logo" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-white-180.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <meta itemprop="width" content="180"> <meta itemprop="height" content="180"></div></div> <h1 class="article-title" data-v-7cdd11fb="">

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯è‚¯å®šçš„ï¼æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘å°†å‘å¤§å®¶ä»‹ç»å‰ç«¯ç¨‹åºå‘˜å¿…å¤‡çš„ä¸¤å¤§æ‘¸é±¼å°æŠ€å·§ï¼š
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </p><p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/764e051305654e0881b5a9dd754d1aee~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=uKe3IbbdmoPpLRdVjU1qBs%2FFHHY%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p><p></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">ä¸€ã€ vscodeè‡ªå®šä¹‰ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µ</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">ä½ç½®</h3>
<ul>
<li>step1
<ul>
<li>æŒ‰ä¸‹ Ctrl+Shift+P(Mac ä¸Šæ˜¯ Cmd+Shift+P)ï¼Œè¾“å…¥ "snippets"</li>
<li>ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…ï¼‰ç‚¹å‡»vscodeå·¦ä¸‹è§’é½¿è½®ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µ</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/ee5572d358a84f20951be5765819754c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=%2BJuxg1L9QViJrR4obK6zbexJ3Ug%3D" alt="image.png" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>step2
<ul>
<li>ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬é€‰æ‹©ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€ã€‚æˆ‘ä¸€èˆ¬é€‰æ‹©å…¨å±€ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä»»æ„çš„æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å®ç°</li>

</li>

<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/6f0b8a5d14bb44cdba009d6fde21acd6~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=gvFLUqmTeqkblYlCT%2B44mJGzIy8%3D" alt="1729256855025.jpg" width="70%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">è¯¦ç»†æ•™ç¨‹</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">1. åŸºæœ¬å±æ€§</h4>
<ul>
<li>prefixï¼šè§¦å‘å¯¹åº”ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µçš„å…³é”®å­—</li>
<li>bodyï¼šå¯¹åº”ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µå†…å®¹</li>
<li>descriptionï¼šä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µçš„æè¿°</li>
</ul>
<h5 data-id="heading-4">ç‰‡æ®µ</h5>

<h5 data-id="heading-5">æ¼”ç¤º</h5>

<h4 data-id="heading-6">2. å ä½ç¬¦</h4>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $1,$2,$3...ç­‰æ˜¯å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç¡®å®šå…‰æ ‡çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨ $1 çš„ä½ç½®,æŒ‰ Tab é”®åä¼šè·³åˆ° $2.
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;æ³¨æ„ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>$0 æ°¸è¿œæ˜¯æœ€åé¢ï¼Œ$1,$2...ç»“æŸåtabä¼šåœ¨$0ã€‚</li>
<li>${1:defalut}ä¸­å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼</li>

<h5 data-id="heading-7">ç‰‡æ®µ</h5>

<h5 data-id="heading-8">æ¼”ç¤º</h5>

<h4 data-id="heading-9">3.å¸¸ç”¨å†…ç½®å˜é‡</h4>
<ul>
<li>ğŸŒŸ<code>$CLIPBOARD</code>: å½“å‰å‰ªè´´æ¿ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹</li>
<li><code>$TM_FILENAME</code>: å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–‡ä»¶å</li>

<li><code>$CURRENT_HOUR</code>: 24å°æ—¶åˆ¶æ ¼å¼çš„å½“å‰æ—¶é—´</li>

<h5 data-id="heading-11">æ¼”ç¤º</h5>

<h4 data-id="heading-12">æ€»ç»“</h4>
<p>æ­å–œä½ åˆå­¦ä¼šäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ‘¸é±¼å°æŠ€å·§ï¼Œå¿«å»åº”ç”¨åˆ°ä½ çš„é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å»å§</p>

<h3 data-id="heading-13">ä¼˜ç§€ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µä¾‹å­</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æˆ‘è‡ªå·±å†™çš„ä¸€äº›éå¸¸å¥½ç”¨çš„ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µï¼Œå¤§å®¶å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶åˆ° VSCode ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å¸Œæœ›èƒ½å¸®åˆ°ä½ ä»¬ï¼å¤§ä½¬ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å‘æŒ¥è‡ªå·±çš„æƒ³è±¡åŠ›ï¼Œåˆ›é€ å‡ºæ›´ç‰›çš„ç‰‡æ®µï¼Œä¸€èµ·æå‡ç¼–ç æ•ˆç‡ï¼ğŸš€</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>

		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"å£°æ˜å˜é‡,å¯é€‰æ‹©const/let/var"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
	<span class="hljs-attr">"paste to log"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"logg"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
			<span class="hljs-string">"console.log('$CLIPBOARD$1', $CLIPBOARD$1);"</span>
		<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
		<span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"æ‰“å°å‡ºå‰ªåˆ‡æ¿å†…å®¹"</span>
	<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/37c590f84ef14008bf10b4b4a5cad6e5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=DSyJcB1m%2FhopVctXOK3NEoaAYwI%3D" alt="image.png" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-14">äºŒã€Emmetæ•™ç¨‹</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">å‰è¨€</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Emmetæ˜¯VSCodeé»˜è®¤æ”¯æŒçš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ— éœ€ä»»ä½•é…ç½®ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å°†ä¸ºä½ æ­ç¤ºå¦‚ä½•åˆ©ç”¨ Emmet åœ¨ VSCode ä¸­ä¼˜é›…åœ°ç¼–å†™å‰ç«¯ä»£ç ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœå®è´µç”Ÿå‘½ã€‚ å’Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µä¼šæœ‰ä¸€ç‚¹ç‚¹åƒï¼Œä½† Emmet çš„è¯­æ³•å°†ä¸ºä½ å¸¦æ¥ä¸åŒçš„ä½“éªŒï¼</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-16">HTMLæ ‡ç­¾åµŒå¥—ï¼š</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-17">1. çˆ¶å­å…³ç³»ï¼š&gt;</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div&gt;p&gt;span
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/7289b8908d284701a79d524f65bd3736~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=9I1fli07i4RvVqCutjs5EpddYU4%3D" alt="emmetã€‹.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-18">2. å…„å¼Ÿå…³ç³»ï¼š+</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div+p+span 
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>

<h4 data-id="heading-19">3. ä¹˜æ³•ï¼š*</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	ul&gt;li*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

<h4 data-id="heading-20">4. ç»„åˆä½¿ç”¨ï¼š()</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	table&gt;(tr&gt;(td*3))*2
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">table</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tr</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>

      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>

<h4 data-id="heading-21">5. id,class,å±æ€§:</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	p#title
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>

//	.title
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span> // divå¯ä»¥ä¸ç”¨å†™

//	td[rowspan=2 colspan=3 title]
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">td</span> <span class="hljs-attr">rowspan</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"2"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">colspan</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"3"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">title</span>=<span class="hljs-string">""</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">td</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-22">6. æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹ï¼š{}</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{æˆ‘æ˜¯div}
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>æˆ‘æ˜¯div<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0472ddac039d48468d0a4119966b4193~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=nFnRn5ieZRSekYthkf91HXtlThE%3D" alt="emmetæ–‡æœ¬.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-23">7.è‡ªå¢ç¬¦å·ï¼š$</h4>
<ol>
<li>å¸¸æ­é…ä¹˜æ³•*ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mtext>ï¼ˆ</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">		ï¼ˆ</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">ï¼ˆ</span></span></span></span></span>*4 =1 2 3 4è‡ªå¢ï¼‰</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	li.item$*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item1"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item2"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item3"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item4"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

//	div{$}*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>1<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>2<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>3<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>4<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0652730ca5564322a51410945e51acb1~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=9JcLFXwhMdpYPcG5qxyq2Ixswj0%3D" alt="emmetè‡ªå¢.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
2.  å ä½ç¬¦ $$
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	ï¼ˆ$$*4 = 01 02 03 04è‡ªå¢ï¼‰
//	li.item$$$*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item001"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item002"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item003"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"item004"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

//	div{$$$$}*4
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0001<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0002<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0003<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>0004<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2abc82f524e2473e96ce4bea8821dee5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=eqBlKroHE8G9e2FdYzGvEc4Cnec%3D" alt="emmetå ä½.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
3.  æŒ‡å®šå¼€å§‹æ•°å­—ï¼š$@num*n		ï¼ˆnum=å¼€å§‹æ•°å­—ï¼Œn=é‡å¤æ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{$@6}*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>6<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>7<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>8<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/9d07327fc2ed4c30a18c6eb4db0072ae~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=Z9rD%2BnoJMWhrJ7poL3kzlJ8DBT8%3D" alt="emmetæŒ‡å®šå¼€å§‹.gif" width="50%" loading="lazy"></p>
4.  å€’åºï¼š$@-
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html">//	div{$@-}*3
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>3<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>2<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>1<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
//	div{$@-6}*3

<h3 data-id="heading-24">cssç¼©å†™</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css">&lt;!-- m10 --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
&lt;!-- m10p --&gt;

&lt;!-- m10-<span class="hljs-number">20</span>-<span class="hljs-number">20</span>-<span class="hljs-number">20</span> --&gt;
<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;

<span class="hljs-attribute">margin-left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;
// ä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨......
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-25">äº†è§£æ›´å¤š</h3>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€äº›å¸¸ç”¨çš„ Emmet è¯­æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ å¯¹ Emmet ä¸­å…¶ä»–éƒ¨åˆ†è¯­æ³•æ„Ÿå…´è¶£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŸ¥é˜…<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.emmet.io%2Fcheat-sheet%2F" target="_blank" title="https://docs.emmet.io/cheat-sheet/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Emmetçš„å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£</a></p>
<p>å„ä½æ‘¸é±¼å¤§ä½¬ä»¬ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–ç§è—çš„å‡å°‘é‡å¤ç¼–ç å°æŠ€å·§å—ï¼Ÿæ¬¢è¿åœ¨è¯„è®ºåŒºåˆ†äº«ä½ çš„ç»éªŒï¼ä¸€èµ·æå‡å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œäº«å—æ›´å¤šçš„â€œæ‘¸é±¼â€æ—¶å…‰ï¼ğŸŸâœ¨</p>
<p align="center"><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3ea082bbd9a1455c9c25411786a8bf40~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv6YeR54aK:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1736779236&amp;x-signature=rqsw8XcrcI%2FKB3n7DW7j1xcXem0%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p></div></div>
